briefTitle: Prevention of Radial Artery Occlusion After Transradial Access Using Nitroglycerin

outcomeMeasures.title: Radial Artery Occlusion
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of radial artery occlusion as confirmed by absence of antegrade flow in vascular doppler ultrasound

outcomeMeasures.title: Late Radial Artery Occlusion
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of radial artery occlusion as confirmed by absence of antegrade flow in vascular doppler ultrasound

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Assessment
outcomeMeasures.description: Pain felt by the patient in the forearm, assessed using numeric pain rating scale ranging from 0 to 10, 0 best (no pain) 10 worst (unbearable pain)

outcomeMeasures.title: Spasm (Operator Evaluation)
outcomeMeasures.description: Catheter friction, as experienced by the operator (subjective measure), during the realization of the procedure

outcomeMeasures.title: Procedure Duration
outcomeMeasures.description: Total duration of the procedure in seconds, from puncture to haemostatic dressing.

outcomeMeasures.title: Radiation Exposure
outcomeMeasures.description: Total radiation used in the procedure
